description.narrative: 7.4. Salaries & personnel costs, travel costs, internal workshops, consultants to support staff capacities (not directly linked to other outputs) in Social Policy & Research Section., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Economic And Social Policy General. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 7. By 2021, Vulnerable children and families benefit from and participate in a strengthened government response to poverty and vulnerability.

sector.narrative: Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
